name: rage-candy-bar
effect: May be traded for a tm64 in the vertical Underground Path.
short_effect: HS: Traded for TM64. Gen II & Gen V: Acts as a Potion.

flavor_text.black_white: A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists like to buy and take home. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists like to buy and take home. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.
